key_risks: Cybersecurity and data breaches due to handling sensitive employee data
Legal and compliance issues, including lawsuits over payroll software errors
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on small and medium-sized businesses
Intense competition from established players and emerging startups
controversies: Lawsuits from clients over payroll software errors leading to compliance violations
social_issues: Commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives
governance_issues: Dependence on compliance with U.S. labor laws, tax regulations, and data privacy standards
